Detailed Description

This class defines a lexer using file extensions, syntax colouring and comment definitions.

This lexer is one of the Scintilla lexers. The lexers are read by and kept in the wxExLexers class.

Member Function Documentation

bool  clear = true 
) const

Applies this lexer to stc component (and colours the component).

bool wxExLexer::ApplyLexer ( const wxString &  lexer,
wxStyledTextCtrl *  stc,
bool  show_error = true,
bool  clear = true 
)

Sets scintilla lexer for specified lexer and stc.

Returns true if a scintilla lexer has been set. The is ok member is set as well according to whether the lexer could be set. Calls Apply.

Parameters:
lexerlexer to use
stcstc component on which to apply
show_errorIf show_error is true, a log error message is given if a lexer was specified, but could not be set.
clearif clear is true, old styles are reset (including folding)
const wxString wxExLexer::GetKeywordsString ( int  keyword_set = -1) const

Gets the keywords as one large string, if keyword_set -1 take all the sets, otherwise take the specified set.

Does any keyword (allways all keywords) start with this word, case insensitive.
